lead_paragraph: There is a close connection between the accelerating drive on the Southern Russian front and the suspended but inevitable battle for the Near East and the great bridgeheads of the Mediterranean. This is the contest underlying all the action in this war like an intermittent but recurrent drumbeat.
abstract: ed, The great test is coming

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
